name: 那山那谷｜特色露營車、懶人露營
address: 宜蘭縣南澳鄉金洋路2號
description: 那山那谷，泰雅語「我的家」的諧音，位於宜蘭縣南澳鄉最深山的村落－金洋村，被群山、溪水環繞，一年四季精彩紛呈，是離幸福最近的世外桃源。

comments.content: 洗澡衛浴當區只有三間有比較少一點，小便斗的部分有阻塞不通要改進，風景優美環境乾淨

comments.content: We were here on the weekdays and We enjoyed the place ourselves (we were the only guests). Place is clean and we stay at the camper, it quite spacious inside also clean. We had their popsicles which are so good, also we had the river by ourselves and the kids loves it. The lady was very friendly even thought we had difficulty communicating. We will come back.
